description.value:
You broaden your magical studies, allowing you to find the right path, detect hidden objects, and conceal those objects from unscrupulous rivals.

You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Augury], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Locate], and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Veil of Privacy] as occult innate spells, each once per day. You can cast this veil of privacy spell only on an object, and it's automatically heightened to half your level rounded up.
